entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 22. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 17 this evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 19. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 19. Wind chill near minus 30. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 28. POP 30%
